name: LeadershipAffirmations
0:
”Alexa, open leadership affirmations”
”Alexa, launch leadership affirmations”
”Alexa, start leadership affirmations”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: leadership affirmations
des:
*Oct 2019: New affirmations added. Thank you for liking Leadership Affirmations. Please leave a review to encourage the developers if you love this skill. And share with your friends and family. The more you share, the happier you are.*


Positive affirmations help open the door and allow our subconscious to make positive changes in our thought process and actions. These leadership affirmations are the first step to start training your subconscious mind to be a successful leader. Use this skill with the Amazon bestseller book "Fast-Track Your Leadership Career" to start your journey.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
